revokeConfirmation.title: Revoke Certificate?
revokeConfirmation.subtitle:
By revoking the certificate, your certificate will be 
 removed from the Tilaka system. To perform digital 
 signatures, you must undergo re-enroll process to 
 issue a new certificate

TnC.instructions: Please read and scroll down to the last paragraph.
TnC.companyStatement: PT Tilaka Nusa Teknologi (“PSrE TILAKA“ or “We“) hereby wish to convey that as the Subscriber and operator of the Digital Signature Services which can be accessed either directly through the URL:
TnC.thirdPartyInfo: or through applications created, operated, developed, or owned by Business Partner (“TILAKA Services”) have terms and conditions (“T&C”) that the Subscriber and/or Applicant (“You”) must agree to before using the TILAKA Services. You are obliged to read, understand, and agree to the contents of these T&C before applying for issuance, reissuance, replacement of the key, receiving, and/or using an Subscriber’s Certificate (“Accessing the TILAKA Services”). In the event that You do not agree to some or all of the provisions set forth in these T&C, then You are not permitted Accessing the TILAKA Services.
TnC.effectiveDate: These T&C become effective after being displayed on one of the pages of the TILAKA Services when You apply for issuance, reissuance, and/or replacement of the Subscriber’s Certificate key. For any application for issuance, reissuance, and/or replacement of the Subscriber’s Certificate key made after these T&C become effective, the provisions of these T&C shall apply to the Subscriber.
TnC.electronicDocumentAcknowledgment: You hereby acknowledge, understand, and agree that these T&C are an Electronic Document and your action of ticking the “checkmark” box during the application for issuance, reissuance, and/or replacement of the Subscriber’s Certificate key constitutes your active consent to be bound by and subject to the provisions contained in these T&C. Therefore, these T&C are valid and legally binding upon You and continue to be effective for as long as you Accessing the TILAKA Services.
TnC.accountDefinition: Account is an alphanumeric code issued by PSrE TILAKA that serves to identify You in using the TILAKA Services.
TnC.personalDataDefinition: Personal Data is data about an individual who is identified or can be identified separately or in combination with other information, whether directly or indirectly, through electronic or non-electronic systems.
TnC.electronicDocumentDefinition: Electronic Document is any Electronic Information created, forwarded, transmitted, received, or stored in analog, digital, electromagnetic, optical, or similar forms, which can be viewed, displayed, and/or heard through a computer or electronic system, including but not limited to writing, sound, images, maps, designs, photos, or similar, letters, signs, numbers, access codes, symbols, or perforations that have meaning or significance or can be understood by those capable of understanding them.
TnC.calendarDayDefiniton: Calendar Day means all days in one year according to the Gregorian calendar without exception, including Saturdays, Sundays, and public holidays set at any time by the Government.
TnC.electronicContractDefiniton: Electronic Contract is an Agreement made through an electronic system.
TnC.subscriberDefiniton: Subscriber is an Indonesian Citizen within the scope of the Customer and is the subject of the Subscriber’s Certificate.
TnC.applicantDefiniton: Applicant is an Indonesian Citizen within the scope of the Customer who applies for issuance, reissuance, or replacement of the Subscriber’s Certificate key within the scope of the Customer. After the Certificate is issued, the Applicant is referred to as the Subscriber.
TnC.customerDefiniton: Customer is a Corporation or Individual who subscribes to the TILAKA Services.
TnC.psreDefinition: PT Tilaka Nusa Teknologi (“PSrE TILAKA”) is a PSrE with root authorization status whose Certificate has been signed by the Root PSrE.
TnC.businessMitraDefiniton: Business Partner is an individual, legal entity, and/or business entity that has a legal relationship either directly or indirectly with PSrE TILAKA and can be proven by a document that can show the legal relationship.
TnC.tilakaRepositoryDefinition: Tilaka Repository is a page on the PSrE TILAKA website that contains all public documents belonging to PSrE TILAKA, which can be accessed through
TnC.certificateDefinition: Certificate is an electronic document containing a digital signature and identity indicating the legal status of the parties involved in the electronic transactions.
TnC.subscriberCertificateDefiniton: Subscriber’s Certificate is a Certificate issued by PSrE TILAKA.
TnC.userAgreement: You agree Accessing the TILAKA Services only for the purposes as specified in these T&C and the list of Public Documents as mentioned in these T&C. You hereby warrant that you will not use the TILAKA Services for fraudulent purposes, cause inconvenience to others, or engage in any other actions that may or may be deemed to cause any form of loss to individuals or other legal entities.
TnC.accountUsage: In order to use the TILAKA Services, You will have an Account that may only be used by You and cannot be transferred to others for any reason or under any circumstances. Therefore, You are obliged to maintain the confidentiality of the Account name and password to be used in connection with the use of the TILAKA Services.
TnC.personalDataSubmission: You agree to provide all information and/or Personal Data requested by PSrE TILAKA along with the required supporting documents related to the activities of Accessing the TILAKA Services.
TnC.verificationClause: You agree that PSrE TILAKA reserves the right to independently verify all information and/or Personal Data in accordance with PSrE TILAKA’s procedures.
TnC.dataAccuracyGuarantee: You hereby warrant that all information and/or Personal Data provided to TILAKA in connection with the activities of Accessing the TILAKA Services are true, clear, accurate, and comprehensive. You are obliged to inform PSrE TILAKA in the event of any changes, additions, or updates to the information and/or Personal Data. PSrE TILAKA reserves the right to reject the application for issuance of the Subscriber’s Certificate, reject the application for reissuance of the Subscriber’s Certificate, reject the application for replacement of the Subscriber’s Certificate key, and/or reject to make changes, additions, or updates to the information and/or Personal Data stored in the TILAKA Services if it is found or reasonably suspected that the information and/or Personal Data provided by You does not comply with the provisions of these T&C and the Public Documents as mentioned in these T&C.
TnC.certificateContentAgreement: You agree to the contents stated in the Subscriber’s Certificate issued by PSrE TILAKA, either through the application process for issuance, reissuance, and/or replacement of the Subscriber’s Certificate key, in the event that:
TnC.certificateContentReview: You have reviewed and approved the information contained in the Subscriber’s Certificate; or
TnC.noResponseClause: You do not respond within a period of 9 (nine) Calendar Days since PSrE TILAKA sends an email regarding the issuance of the Subscriber’s Certificate.
TnC.keyReplacementClause: In the event of an application to replace the Subscriber’s Certificate key, You hereby acknowledge and agree that:
TnC.keyChangeImpact: The replacement of the Subscriber’s Certificate key will result in PSrE TILAKA issuing a new Subscriber’s Certificate with a new public key, serial number, and key identifier, while the personal information of the Subscriber contained in the Subscriber’s Certificate used to sign the application for replacement of this new Subscriber’s Certificate key will remain used on the new Subscriber’s Certificate to be issued by PSrE TILAKA;
TnC.keyChangeGeneration: The replacement of the Subscriber’s Certificate key will result in PSrE TILAKA generating a new key pair associated with the Subscriber’s Certificate used to sign the application for replacement of this new Subscriber’s Certificate key; and/or
TnC.newCertificateValidity: The validity period of the new Subscriber’s Certificate will be different from the Subscriber’s Certificate used to sign this application for replacement of the new Subscriber’s Certificate key.
TnC.prohibitedUsage: You agree not to use the TILAKA Services in the following ways:
TnC.illegalUse: Use the TILAKA Services for purposes that violate the applicable law or regulations;
TnC.damageOrTampering: Engage in actions, either due to negligence or intention, that fundamentally damage, eliminate, hide, cause changes, additions, subtractions, and/or make the TILAKA Services unusable either partially or completely;
TnC.violationOfRights: Engage in actions that either intentionally or through negligence cause in violations of PSrE TILAKA's rights, for matters including but not limited to privacy violations, copyright, trademarks, patents, trade secrets, or other intellectual property rights, rights arising from contractual relationships between PSrE TILAKA and other third parties, and/or other rights owned by PSrE TILAKA, either presently or in the future, protected by applicable laws and regulations; and
TnC.copyModify: Engage in actions such as copy, modify, adapt, translate, create derivative works from, reverse engineer, or disassemble any part, whether in part or in whole of the TILAKA Services.
TnC.serviceSuspension: You agree that PSrE TILAKA reserves the right to temporarily or permanently suspend, with or without the revocation of your Account and/or Subscriber’s Certificate, in the event of activities to improve the Services provided by the TILAKA Services or any violations by You of the provisions of these T&C.
TnC.informationDisclosure: In the course of your activities Accessing the TILAKA Services, You acknowledge and agree that PSrE TILAKA will disclose some or all of the information contained in the Subscriber’s Certificate to relying parties and/or other parties, which PSrE TILAKA will do subject to the provisions set forth in the Public Documents as mentioned in these T&C.
TnC.publicDocumentsCompliance: In Accessing the TILAKA Services, You agree to adhere to the provisions contained in the Public Documents found in the Tilaka Repository and the links provided at the end of these T&C, which consist of:
TnC.partnerAppUsage: In the event that You use the TILAKA Services through application created, operated, developed, or owned by Business Partner, (“business partner application”), You should be acknowledged and agreed that We have no control over the contents of that application before You choose to use the TILAKA Services. Your access or use of the business partner application before using the TILAKA Services is subject to the terms and conditions and privacy policy specified by Business Partner.
TnC.appUsageAgreement: In the event that You use the TILAKA Services through a business partner application, You hereby acknowledge and agree that:
TnC.documentStorage: Business Partner can store the uploaded results of Electronic Documents such as the National Identity Card (“KTP”) that You use in order to apply for the issuance of an Subscriber’s Certificate; and
TnC.nikStorage: For the purpose of internal logging of the Subscriber’s Certificate issuance applications you make, Business Partner can store the national identification number (“NIK”) information You provide.
TnC.liabilityWaiver: In the event that You use the TILAKA Services through a business partner application, You hereby release Us from any responsibility for any actions taken by Business Partner regarding any content or part of such business partner application, including how the business partner application obtains, collects, processes, stores, displays, announces, transmits, and destroys your Personal Data before, during, and after You use the TILAKA Services.
TnC.liabilityAndIndemnity: In the event that due to your negligence or intention in implementing the provisions of these T&C cause losses which are incurred by PSrE TILAKA, You, or other third parties, You hereby agree to release, indemnify, compensate, and defend PSrE TILAKA, including its directors, commissioners, employees, and/or partners for matters including but not limited to demands, claims, losses, claims, liabilities, obligations, damages, expenses, and costs incurred.
TnC.disclosureForLegalCompliance: You agree that PSrE TILAKA may disclose or provide access to your information, Electronic Documents, Electronic Contracts, and/or Personal Data in order to comply with legal provisions, regulations, and/or court decisions, carried out as part of the enforcement process or further preventive actions related to unauthorized activities, suspected criminal acts, legal violations, and/or violations of applicable regulations.
TnC.intellectualProperty: The names, program codes, business models, designs, trademarks, colors, images, videos, audios, technologies, and other aspects related to the TILAKA Services that are not yet, in the process of being, or have been registered in the name of PSrE TILAKA, are protected by intellectual property rights including but not limited to copyrights, trademarks, patents, and intellectual property rights regulated by the laws of the Republic of Indonesia. Your actions in accessing and using the TILAKA Services do not result in the transfer, either in part or in whole, of any Intellectual Property Rights associated with the TILAKA Services to You.
TnC.contactInformation: You can contact PSrE TILAKA via email at
TnC.nextContactInformation: or by sending physical documents to the PSrE TILAKA office at Belleza Shopping Arcade 3rd Floor Unit SA 0380, Jl. Arteri Permata Hijau No. 34, RT.004/RW.002, Grogol Utara, Kebayoran Lama, Jakarta Selatan, 12210.
TnC.disputeResolutionDetails: Any disputes related to the interpretation or implementation of these T&C, the parties agree to resolve them through amicable negotiations. If the parties fail to reach an agreement through amicable negotiations, they agree to settle them through the South Jakarta District Court according to PSrE TILAKA's domicile.
TnC.dataAccuracy: I declare that the information I have provided is true and can be accounted for.
